00082 typedef struct _KviChannelAction
00083 {
00084         QString      szNick;       // action source nick
00085         unsigned int uActionType;  // type of the action
00086         kvi_time_t   tTime;        // time of the action
00087         int          iTemperature; // temperature of the action
00088 } KviChannelAction;

00095 typedef struct _KviChannelActivityStats
00096 {
00097         unsigned int        uActionCount;              // number of actions in the history
00098         bool                bStatsInaccurate;          // the stats are inaccurate because we have just joined the chan
00099         unsigned int        uLastActionTimeSpan;       // the timespan between the last action and now
00100         unsigned int        uFirstActionTimeSpan;      // the time span between the first and the last action
00101         double              dActionsPerMinute;         // average number of actions per minute in the lastActionTimeSpan
00102         unsigned int        uActionsInTheLastMinute;   // number of actions in the last minute
00103         int                 iAverageActionTemperature; // the average chan temperature
00104         unsigned int        uHotActionCount;
00105         unsigned int        uHotActionPercent;
00106         QStringList         lTalkingUsers;             // users that seem to be talking NOW
00107         QStringList         lWereTalkingUsers;
00108 } KviChannelActivityStats;

00122         enum StateFlag {
00123                 HaveAllNames       =        1,   
00124                 HaveWhoList        = (1 << 2),   
00125                 DeadChan           = (1 << 3),   
00126                 SentWhoRequest     = (1 << 4),   
00127                 SentPart           = (1 << 5),   
00128                 Synchronized       = (1 << 6),   
00129                 NoCloseOnPart      = (1 << 7),   
00130                 SentSyncWhoRequest = (1 << 8)    
00131         };

00143                 VeryHot   = 70    
00144         };
